au.edu.uow.QuestionDB

Interface QuestionDB


  • public interface QuestionDB
    This interface specifies the requirements of implementation classes This program is provided for the CSCI213 Assignment.
    Note: You should not modify this program but create a suitable class to implement this interface.
    Version:
    v.1.0
    Author:
    Lei Ye

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addQuestion(Question question)
      This method adds a question to the database
      boolean buildQuestionDB(java.lang.String questionFile)
      This method creates and populates a table in the database storing the questions from the question file.
      boolean cleanUpDB()
      This method removes the created table from the database
      Question getQuestion(int questionIndex)
      This method returns the question from the database at the given position
      int getTotalNumberOfQuestions()
      This method returns the total number of questions in the database
      java.util.List<Question> makeQuiz(int noOfQuestions)
      This method makes a quiz from the question database with the number of questions as specified.

    • Method Detail

      • buildQuestionDB

        boolean buildQuestionDB(java.lang.String questionFile)
        This method creates and populates a table in the database storing the questions from the question file. This method should use the addQuestion method to insert question content into the database
        Parameters:
        questionFile - The file name of the question file
        Returns:
        True if the database is successfully populated
        See Also:
        addQuestion(Question)

      • getTotalNumberOfQuestions

        int getTotalNumberOfQuestions()
        This method returns the total number of questions in the database
        Returns:
        The total number of questions in the question database
        See Also:
        buildQuestionDB(java.lang.String)

      • getQuestion

        Question getQuestion(int questionIndex)
        This method returns the question from the database at the given position
        Parameters:
        questionIndex - The index of the question in the database
        Returns:
        The question object

      • addQuestion

        boolean addQuestion(Question question)
        This method adds a question to the database
        Parameters:
        question - The question object to be added to the database
        Returns:
        True if the operation is successful

      • cleanUpDB

        boolean cleanUpDB()
        This method removes the created table from the database
        Returns:
        True if the operation is successful
        See Also:
        buildQuestionDB(String)

      • makeQuiz

        java.util.List<Question> makeQuiz(int noOfQuestions)
        This method makes a quiz from the question database with the number of questions as specified. This method should use the getQuestion method to retrieval question content from the database
        Parameters:
        noOfQuestions - - the number of questions in a quiz
        Returns:
        Quiz questions in a list
        See Also:
        getQuestion(int)
